#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

bool isEqual(string a, string b){
    for(int i = 0; i < a.length(); i++){
        if(a[i] != b[i]){
            return false;
        }
    }
    return true;
}

int main() {

  int t = 0;

  cin>>t;

  while(t--){
    string a = "";
    string b = "";

    cin>>a;
    cin>>b;

    sort(a.begin(), a.end());
    sort(b.begin(), b.end());

    if(isEqual(a, b)){
        cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
    }
    else{
        cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
    }
  }
	
	return 0;
}
